channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How We Obtained 10,000 Police Disciplinary Records
item.description: The New York Times and New York Focus gathered thousands of files from around half of New York State’s nearly 500 law enforcement agencies.

item.title: ASML to Invest $1.5 Billion in Mistral, the French A.I. Start-Up
item.description: ASML, the Dutch maker of semiconductor equipment, is investing about $1.5 billion in Mistral, the French A.I. start-up.

item.title: Here they are: The best student podcasts in America

item.title: A new Nation's Report Card shows drops in science, math and reading scores
item.description: It's the first Nation's Report Card since the Trump administration began making cuts to the U.S. Education Department. The scores reflect the state of...

item.title: The Forces Behind Nepal’s Explosive Gen Z Protests: What to Know
item.description: It was a recent ban on social media that brought young people to the streets, but they came filled with grievances that have built up over years.

item.title: Trump's Medicaid cuts will hurt children's hospitals

item.title: The 2025 Student Podcast Challenge Honorable Mentions
item.description: Here are the honorable mentions from this year's Student Podcast Challenge, chosen from nearly 2,000 entries.

item.title: Nepal's prime minister resigns following violent protests against social media ban
item.description: Nepal's prime minister resigned Tuesday following violent protests against a ban on social media platforms and government corruption.

item.title: Israel Orders Evacuation of Gaza City, and Congress Releases Epstein Birthday Notes
item.description: Plus, the fight for control of Fox News.

item.title: Nepal’s Prime Minister Resigns as Protesters Set Fire to Leaders’ Houses

item.title: Scientists Begin Testing Bird Flu Vaccine in Seals
item.description: If the results are promising, veterinarians hope to give the shots to wild Hawaiian monk seals, which are endangered.

item.title: The Forces Behind Nepal’s Explosive Gen Z Protests: What to Know
item.description: It was a recent ban on social media that brought young people to the streets, but they came filled with grievances that have built up over years.
